name: CodeNow
headline: Our mission is to diversify the talent pipeline of students whoâ¦
description: CodeNow is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit transforming high school students into coders, designers, and product managers. By helping students unlock their intrinsic motivations, they are learning to solve meaningful problems in their communities with software.

## Scale with Confidence
CodeNOW® thrives in dynamic environments where real-time operations have considerable fluctuation in bandwidth, CPU, and memory demands. These variations, driven by day and night cycles or high-season versus low-season dynamics, coupled with the outsourcing of complete application deliveries, create the perfect storm where CodeNOW demonstrates its robustness and efficiency.
![CodeNOW screen with stack setup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/63fd1060c7c8a915ca3083d1_codenow-homepage-screen-optimized.gif)
## Ease of Adoption
Adoption of CodeNOW® is as simple as it gets. Onboard a single developer, single team or the whole organisation. Integrate with your existing toolset such as Gitlab, Github, Artifactory, Sonar, Vault and more to leverage your software investments during enterprise-wide adoption. Alternatively, use CodeNOW as SAAS with all integrated tooling out of the box. Your choice.
![Codenow screen with database tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/64bf764d8945f4821226e7e8_CodeNOW-adoption-rttechnology.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/622512020a5637011563480c_hexa-bg-shape-col.svg)
Testimonials
## CodeNOW benefits in action
We were built for the enterprise environment, with small companies on mind.
![A logo of a KB - a bank.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/6206dc3de1a935a2d37efbfa_kb_logo.png)
The delivery platform helped us to start cloud-native development based on robust unified grounds at scale… It is our platform of choice for long-term, business-driven, technology-enabled transformation.
![David Svejda
Head of New Digital Bank at Komerční Banka](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/6206dc45bc1c9a75b65d2b2c_David%20Svejda%201.png)
David Svejda
Head of New Digital Bank at Komerční Banka
KB is a daughter of Societé-General, one of the biggest banks in the world. CodeNOW fitted right in.
![Personal AI logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/63e79bc9f173052142efe5c9_Personal-AI-logo.png)
We have complete insight into our infrastructure and applications, which has improved our delivery performance and allowed us to easily deploy into different cloud providers. This has resulted in significant cost and time savings, as well as improved customer experience. 
![Suman Kanuganti](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/64bf70a08aed68dff31f9b29_Personal-AI-CEO-img%201.png)
Suman Kanuganti
Founder, CEO
Personal AI uses technology to solve human problems - memory retention and recall.
![A logo of a Packeta group. Image of a white box on a red background with white name Packeta.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/6206dc3e39b3435ebdc1bc99_Logo_Packeta_s.r.o%201.png)
We’re facing a scaling challenge. The business grows with incredible speed and our IT systems must keep pace. We’ve started the transformation to a microservice and product-based organization. With CodeNOW, we were able to launch this mission instantly. It’s a solid cloud-native backbone.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/6206dc45ffd343c943cad6c9_1633352114243%201.png)
Adam Horzenberger
Group CTO at Packeta
Packeta is the leading European parcel distribution business, with billions of deliveries around Europe.
![A logo of a bank.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/6206dc3de1a935a2d37efbfa_kb_logo.png)
The delivery platform helped us to start cloud-native development based on robust unified grounds at scale… It is our platform of choice for long-term, business-driven, technology-enabled transformation.‍

## Scale with Confidence
CodeNOW® thrives in dynamic environments where real-time operations have considerable fluctuation in bandwidth, CPU, and memory demands. These variations, driven by day and night cycles or high-season versus low-season dynamics, coupled with the outsourcing of complete application deliveries, create the perfect storm where CodeNOW demonstrates its robustness and efficiency.
![CodeNOW screen with stack setup⟨52⟩]
## Ease of Adoption
Adoption of CodeNOW® is as simple as it gets. Onboard a single developer, single team or the whole organisation. Integrate with your existing toolset such as Gitlab, Github, Artifactory, Sonar, Vault and more to leverage your software investments during enterprise-wide adoption. Alternatively, use CodeNOW as SAAS with all integrated tooling out of the box. Your choice.
![Codenow screen with database tools⟨53⟩]
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6206dba695511b0e7113cb5f/622512020a5637011563480c_hexa-bg-shape-col.svg)
Testimonials
## CodeNOW benefits in action
We were built for the enterprise environment, with small companies on mind.

Suman Kanuganti
Founder, CEO
Personal AI uses technology to solve human problems - memory retention and recall.

generated_description:
### CodeNow: Bridging Talent and Technology

**Mission**: CodeNow seeks to diversify the talent pipeline of students by transforming high school kids into proficient coders, designers, and product managers. They focus on nurturing intrinsic motivations and empowering youth to tackle meaningful challenges in their communities through software.

**About the Company**: As a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization based in Chicago, IL, CodeNow was founded as part of Y Combinator's W14 batch. With a small team of just two employees, CodeNow is dedicated to providing impactful education to youth. They help students unlock their potential and contribute positively to society using technology.

**What They Do**:
- **Education Focus**: CodeNow trains students in coding and design, fostering essential skills in the tech industry.
- **Broader Services**: They also offer solutions for enterprises, startups, and agencies, positioning themselves as a versatile partner in the tech landscape.

**Current Achievements**: Recently, CodeNow earned an honorable mention in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for DevOps Platforms 2023—a testament to their quality and impact in the software development domain.

**Technological Capabilities**: The platform integrates various services from design and creation to release and monitoring, all while supporting modern microservices development. They offer options for enterprises and startups, including partnership opportunities that can help grow businesses.

**Community Impact**: By focusing on high school students, CodeNow addresses the critical issue of underrepresentation in technology fields. Their approach not only empowers the next generation of tech professionals but also aligns well with community needs.

For more information and to engage with their initiatives, you can visit [CodeNow's website](http://codenow.org). If you're interested in their mission or services, don’t hesitate to reach out!
